study_name: HTAN: Human Tumor Atlas Network Primary Sequencing Data
study_description: An NCI-funded Cancer Moonshot initiative to construct 3-dimensional atlases of the dynamic cellular, morphological, and molecular features of human cancers as they evolve from precancerous lesions to advanced disease.
primary_investigator_name: Jeremy Goecks,Gordon Mills,George Thomas, Ken S. Lau,Robert Coffey,Martha Shrubsole, Li Ding,Ryan Fields,William Gillanders,Samuel Achilefu, Michael P. Snyder,James Ford,William Greenleaf, Nir Hacohen, Peter Sorger,Jon Aster,Sandro Santagata
